title: "What Not To Do at a Table" - Safety Tools in TTRPG
itunes:title: "What Not To Do at a Table" - Safety Tools in TTRPG
description:
Today we're discussing a topic posed by some members of our Discord Server, Safety Tools in Dungeon & Dragons and TTRPG. We're covering some tips we have found, some good, and not so good examples, plus resources to make your tables feel a little bit more comfortable for everyone.

Golden Lasso Games Article: http://goldenlassogames.com/tools


*** TRIGGER WARNING ***

This episode contains discussions of sexual violence and consent.
